attributes.action: call for the resignation of Max Mosley as president of the FIA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister should call for Max Mosley's resignation because of the  personal remarks the President of the FIA directed at Sir Jackie Stewart.  These remarks were in response to Sir Jackie's considered comments regarding the F1 Spygate affair.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
